18190561.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would provide for:
            (a) construction units Nos. 4 and 5 (200 MW each) at the
            Muara Karang thermal power plant; and (b) engineering and
            design, including the preparation bidding documents,
            including evaluation of bids, for the third unit (200 MW) at
            the Semarang Harbor Steam Electric Station; (c) provision of
            engineering services for interconnection of the Java System
            including detailed design and preparation of bidding
            documents for Phase I of the interconnection.
